settings.title: Settings
settings.passwordHelp: If you set a password, the application will ask for a password at startup. Also, if the auto-lock option is active, it will ask for a password. You can leave it blank.
settings.currencyFixHelp: In the payment screen, the total value proceeds in multiples of 5 cents.
settings.showImageHelp: Shows the product photo in the quick selection section.
settings.autoLockHelp: If you don't take any action for 10 minutes, it shows the lock screen.
settings.localBackupHelp: Creates hourly backups to your Documents folder. You can manually upload and use the backup.
settings.cloudBackupHelp: If you have a Rovave account, you can save your backups to the remote server. You can download them anytime.

categories.title: Category List
categories.name: Category Name
categories.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the category?
categories.nameRequired: Category name must be more than 3 characters.

payment.title: Payment
payment.emptyCart: Cart is empty. Add products using the barcode scanner.

payments.title: Made Payments
payments.noPayments: No payments recorded for the selected date.
payments.deleteWarning: This action is not recommended. If the payment is deleted, historical reports will change. This may cause the reporting system to malfunction.
payments.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the selected payment?
payments.selectProducts: Please select the products to be refunded.
payments.refundConfirm: The selected products will be refunded. Do you want to continue?

planning.title: Planner
planning.selectFromCalendar: You can select date and time from the calendar.
planning.noAlarms: No alarms added for this date.
planning.noPlans: No plans added for this date.

error404.message: A non-existent screen was requested to open.

dataControl.title: Data Control
dataControl.warning: Warning! Do not use this screen if you are not authorized and knowledgeable.
